text: Elizabeth Guttman "E.G." Daily (born Elizbeth Ann Guttman, September 11, 1961, in Los Angeles, CaliforniaState of California. California Birth Index, 1905â€“1995. Center for Health Statistics, California Department of Health Services, Sacramento, California. Lists Elizabeth A. Guttman on September 11, 1961.) is an American actress and singer. She has acted on television and in movies and video games. She is best known as the voice of Thomas Malcolm "Tommy" Pickles in Rugrats/All Grown Up and The Powerpuff Girls franchise. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Singers from Los Angeles Category:Singer-songwriters from California Category:1961 births Category:Living people
title: E.G. Daily
